EllipticalArc.cpp

00001 #include "EllipticalArc.h"
00002 #include "AffineTransformationMatrix.h"
00003 #include "MathManager.h"
00004 #include <cmath>
00005 
00006 namespace jvgs
00007 {
00008     namespace math
00009     {
00010         EllipticalArc::EllipticalArc(const Vector2D &start,
00011                 const Vector2D &radius, float phi, bool largeArc, bool sweep,
00012                 const Vector2D &end)
00013         {
00014             this->radius = radius;
00015             this->phi = phi;
00016             
00017             AffineTransformationMatrix rotate, rotateMinus;
00018             rotate.rotate(phi);
00019             rotateMinus.rotate(-phi);
00020 
00021             Vector2D tmp1 = rotateMinus * ((start - end) / 2.0f);
00022 
00023             float s = sqrt((
00024                     radius.getX() * radius.getX() *
00025                     radius.getY() * radius.getY() -
00026                     radius.getX() * radius.getX() *
00027                     tmp1.getY() * tmp1.getY() -
00028                     radius.getY() * radius.getY() *
00029                     tmp1.getX() * tmp1.getX()) / (
00030                     radius.getX() * radius.getX() *
00031                     tmp1.getY() * tmp1.getY() +
00032                     radius.getY() * radius.getY() *
00033                     tmp1.getX() * tmp1.getX()));
00034             if(largeArc == sweep)
00035                 s = -s;
00036 
00037             Vector2D tmpCenter = Vector2D(
00038                     radius.getX() * tmp1.getY() / radius.getY(),
00039                     -radius.getY() * tmp1.getX() / radius.getX()) * s;
00040 
00041             center = rotate * tmpCenter + (start + end) / 2.0f;
00042 
00043             theta1 = Vector2D(1.0f, 0.0f).getAngle(Vector2D(
00044                     (tmp1.getX() - tmpCenter.getX()) / radius.getX(),
00045                     (tmp1.getY() - tmpCenter.getY()) / radius.getY()));
00046             deltaTheta = Vector2D(
00047                     (tmp1.getX() - tmpCenter.getX()) / radius.getX(),
00048                     (tmp1.getY() - tmpCenter.getY()) / radius.getY()).getAngle(
00049                     Vector2D((-tmp1.getX() - tmpCenter.getX()) / radius.getX(),
00050                     (-tmp1.getY() - tmpCenter.getY()) / radius.getY()));
00051 
00052             if(!sweep && deltaTheta > 0.0f)
00053                 deltaTheta -= 360.0f;
00054             else if(sweep && deltaTheta < 0.0f)
00055                 deltaTheta += 360.0f;
00056 
00057             if(theta1 > deltaTheta)
00058                 theta1 -= 360.0f;
00059 
00060             calculateLength();
00061         }
00062 
00063         EllipticalArc::~EllipticalArc()
00064         {
00065         }
00066 
00067         Vector2D EllipticalArc::getPoint(float t) const
00068         {
00069             AffineTransformationMatrix rotate;
00070             rotate.rotate(phi);
00071             float theta = theta1 + t * deltaTheta;
00072             return rotate * Vector2D(radius.getX() * cos(theta * float(M_PI) / 180.0f),
00073                     radius.getY() * sin(theta * float(M_PI) / 180.0f)) + center;
00074         }
00075 
00076         float EllipticalArc::getLengthGuess() const
00077         {
00078             return MathManager::getInstance()->max<float>(radius.getX(),
00079                     radius.getY()) * float(M_PI) * 2.0f;
00080         }
00081     }
00082 }
